transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, hello? Am I speaking with satyo here? Satya yagi.
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello. Am I speaking with satyo here?
Speaker A: Hello, hello?
Speaker B: Yeah.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello. Hello, yes, yeah, this calling you from Amber Student. Am I speaking with Saty over here? Yes, yeah, hello Satya, I just wanted to confirm if you have decided with the student accommodation partner. I can see that you are looking to book a stay at University College London. Correct. So have you secured any accommodation? Have you finalized anything by the website?
Speaker A: Sorry, I'm a bit having difficulty with listening to you. Sorry, can you repeat again?
Speaker C: So what I'm saying here is have you shortlisted and find the accommodation like you desired for?
Speaker D: Huh.
Speaker A: Outside And I mean. Sorry, sorry, it's a bit noisy here. Sorry, let me go inside.
Speaker C: Yeah, sure, go ahead.
Speaker D: Yeah.
Speaker C: So what I'm saying here is I can see that you're looking to book a student accommodation, correct?
Speaker A: Yes, it's correct, yes.
Speaker C: Just wanted to confirm if you have find anything on the website, like if you have fine lights or anything. I can see that you are interested in Canvas Author House.
Speaker A: Yeah, I'm still searching, I mean looking at some options on the website.
Speaker D: But.
Speaker A: I haven't applied to any of these.
Speaker C: Okay, so what kind of accommodations that you are looking for? If you can just let me know the preferences, I can share you the options that I have.
Speaker A: Oh yeah, I'm looking at the studio option. Yeah. And yeah, I mean I go to the ucl, so if it's, you know, closer to the ucl, that's good.
Speaker C: And what's the budget that you're looking for?
Speaker A: And yeah, and then the budget will be like around 1800 per month.
Speaker C: I guess I can arrange something for that. That is not an issue. I can see that this number isn't being available on the WhatsApp. So can you please confirm your WhatsApp number so that I can share you the available options?
Speaker D: Huh? Thank you.
Speaker A: So that's plus. Yeah. Plus four one.
Speaker C: Just a moment. Plus four one.
Speaker D: Yes.
Speaker A: Nine. Sorry, seven seven.
Speaker D: Sorry.
Speaker A: Plus 4177.
Speaker C: Yes.
Speaker A: Nine one one.
Speaker C: Yeah.
Speaker A: And 5858.
Speaker C: Just a moment. So it's plus 417-79-115858, correct?
Speaker D: Yes, correct.
Speaker C: Let me quickly drop you. Yeah, I have dropped you and hello, can you please confirm if you have received it.
Speaker D: Sorry.
Speaker C: I have dropped you and. Hello, can you please confirm if you have received my messages? Right, Yes, I will share you the options that are available within 1800 pounds. Okay. On your WhatsApp and you can finalize after that.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker D: Okay, thank you for your help. Yeah, that's it.
Speaker C: Okay, bye. Bye.
Speaker D: Oh, can I ask you ask?
Speaker C: Yeah, please, go ahead. You can ask me. You can ask me.
Speaker D: Oh, yeah, yeah.
Speaker A: So, you know, for example, I'm looking at some accommodation. That's it. For example, you know, available for 12.
Speaker D: Weeks, by the way.
Speaker A: I need the accommodation until the end.
Speaker D: Of March next year. Yeah. So, for example, if that says I go for 12 weeks from, let's say, September 13th to December, but September 13th.
Speaker A: Is already right past and I'm moving.
Speaker D: In on the 29th of September. Yeah. If that's the case, like, do I.
Speaker A: Still have to, for example, pay the.
Speaker D: The whole amount for the, you know, 12 weeks?
Speaker C: No, no, I can. I don't know. I can manage that. I can start the movement from 17 or 18 or basically on the date of the movement.
Speaker D: I see, I see.
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: So I'm gonna move in on the 29th.
Speaker D: Yeah.
Speaker C: So I think I'll be able to arrange something for 29. That is not an issue.
Speaker D: Okay, thank you.
Speaker C: Okay, welcome. I will share you the option very soon.
Speaker D: Thank you. Bye.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, Am I speaking with Satyo here?
Speaker B: Yes. Yes.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello, Satya, the site from Amber. We have connected on WhatsApp regarding the accommodation for you.
Speaker B: Huh?
Speaker A: Just wanted to confirm like if we have decided with the options now. Like Author House was available now on 4th of October, like I told you. And also I've shared you another property. So have we decided anything?
Speaker B: Huh?
Speaker A: Have you decided?
Speaker B: Sorry. So I. Sorry, can you repeat?
Speaker A: I'll connect you on WhatsApp. Okay. Yeah, I will connect you on WhatsApp. I think the network line is.
Speaker B: Yeah, that's it. That's better. Yes, thank you.

tasks.description: Agent to share available student accommodation options within £1800/month near UCL via WhatsApp to the student
tasks.source_reference: 2025-09-18 call where agent confirmed budget and location preferences and requested WhatsApp number to send options

tasks.description: Agent to follow up with student on WhatsApp to confirm if accommodation options shared have been reviewed and if any decision has been made
tasks.source_reference: 2025-09-20 call where agent asked if student has decided on options shared on WhatsApp

tasks_actionables.last_agent_response: Agent confirmed budget and location preferences with student, obtained WhatsApp number, and committed to sharing accommodation options within budget and near UCL. Later agent followed up to check if student has decided on options shared.
tasks_actionables.suggested_next_step: Agent to send accommodation options to student via WhatsApp and await student's response.

accommodation_preferences.locations: London, preferably close to University College London
accommodation_preferences.lease_duration: 5 to 25 weeks (noted in lead info), specifically discussed 12 weeks until end of March next year
accommodation_preferences.special_requirements: Lease start date flexible to move-in date; accommodation needed until end of March 2026

current_status.booking_stage: Property selection stage; student still searching and reviewing options

communication_summary.response_time: Student responds with some difficulty due to noise and network issues; generally responsive
communication_summary.key_moments: Initial contact on 16 Sept with unclear connection; detailed discussion on 18 Sept about preferences and WhatsApp number; follow-up on 20 Sept to confirm decision on options

properties_discussed.properties_mentioned: Canvas Author House and another unnamed property shared via WhatsApp
properties_discussed.preferences_expressed: Prefers studio accommodation close to UCL, budget around £1800/month, flexible move-in date starting 29 Sept
properties_discussed.offers_made: Agent confirmed ability to arrange accommodation starting from move-in date; no formal offers mentioned

next_steps.immediate_actions: Agent to share available accommodation options on WhatsApp within budget and preferred move-in date
next_steps.pending_items: Student to review options shared on WhatsApp and decide
next_steps.follow_up_required: Agent to follow up after student reviews options to confirm booking decision
next_steps.timeline: Move-in date 29 September 2025; lease duration up to end of March 2026

agent_notes.student_tone: Polite but sometimes has difficulty hearing due to noise and network issues; cooperative
agent_notes.urgency_level: Moderate urgency due to upcoming move-in date at end of September
agent_notes.complexity: Moderate complexity due to flexible lease start and duration requirements
agent_notes.special_considerations: Student requires lease to start on move-in date, not earlier; budget and location preferences clearly stated
